name: tiny_url
description: TinyUrl is a URL shortening service designed for business clients who publish links to landing pages and online files. Once a client registers for the service, they can enter the URL of a landing page, website, or online file (such as a PDF guide stored in Google Drive) to generate a shortened URL. The shortened URL is constructed from the TinyUrl service address with a parameter identifying the original URL.
author: miriam_krausz
